name: UDJ01GameplayAbility
doc:
UDJ01GameplayAbility

    The base gameplay ability class used by this project.

ActivationPolicy: Defines how this ability is meant to activate.
ActivationGroup: Defines the relationship between this ability activating and other abilities activating.
AdditionalCosts: Additional costs that must be paid to activate this ability
FailureTagToUserFacingMessages: Map of failure tags to simple error messages
FailureTagToAnimMontage: Map of failure tags to anim montages that should be played with them
bLogCancelation: If true, extra information should be logged when this ability is canceled. This is temporary, used for tracking a bug.

methods.name: CanChangeActivationGroup
methods.doc: Returns true if the requested activation group is a valid transition.

methods.name: ChangeActivationGroup
methods.doc: Tries to change the activation group.  Returns true if it successfully changed.

methods.name: ClearCameraMode
methods.doc: Clears the ability's camera mode.  Automatically called if needed when the ability ends.

methods.name: OnAbilityAdded
methods.doc: Called when this ability is granted to the ability system component.

methods.name: OnAbilityRemoved
methods.doc: Called when this ability is removed from the ability system component.

methods.name: OnPawnAvatarSet
methods.doc: Called when the ability system is initialized with a pawn avatar.

methods.name: ScriptOnAbilityFailedToActivate
methods.doc: Called when the ability fails to activate
